title: Court Order
marks:
Signature, date, title, number, chop mark LL: [Progressive Proof - State 5 of 5]
Lower cent
description: Abstract depiction of a court room with angular, simplified objects; on R, a large, grey-orange podium with standing (or seated) figure; on L, three long rows with several figures; front row is grey-green, second and third row is grey-orange; section of American flag on R border; background is grey-brown
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
